publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-77 Charlie Gordon: Congratulations to Queen’s Park FC on Promotion to the 2nd Division—That the Parliament congratulates Queen’s Park Football Club, Scotland’s oldest football club, on securing promotion to the Scottish Second Division; recognises its Queen’s Park in the Community initiative which has provided football training for local youths during school holidays; welcomes its Youth Football Development programme in which every secondary school in Glasgow participates, encouraging pupils in their first year at secondary school to develop football skills and attain a healthier lifestyle through professional coaching, and recognises the commitment of head coach, Billy Stark, in implementing these initiatives. Supported by: David Stewart*, Sandra White*, Andy Kerr*, Patricia Ferguson*, Ken Macintosh*, Karen Gillon*, Hugh O’Donnell*, John Park*, Trish Godman*

S3M-77 Congratulations to Queen’s Park FC on Promotion to the 2nd Division (lodged on 24 May 2007) Bashir Ahmad*, Brian Adam*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Butler*, Des McNulty*, Michael McMahon*, Bob Doris*, Bill Aitken*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-77 Congratulations to Queen’s Park FC on Promotion to the 2nd Division (lodged on 24 May 2007) Pauline McNeill*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-77 Congratulations to Queen’s Park FC on Promotion to the 2nd Division (lodged on 24 May 2007) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-77 Congratulations to Queen’s Park FC on Promotion to the 2nd Division (lodged on 24 May 2007) Mr Jamie Stone*
S3M-77 Congratulations to Queen’s Park FC on Promotion to the 2nd Division (lodged on 24 May 2007) Alasdair Allan*
